resources.string: Oppenheimer (2023) is a biographical thriller about the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the scientist who led the Manhattan Project to develop the atomic bomb. The film explores the moral and ethical implications of Oppenheimer\'s work, and the impact it had on his personal life.

Two men, Andy Dufresne, a banker, and Ellis \"Red\" Redding, a contraband smuggler, befriend each other over the years of their imprisonment at Shawshank State Penitentiary, a brutal Maine maximum security facility.

" Hanks) has never thought of himself as disadvantaged, and thanks to his supportive mother (Sally Field), he leads anything but a restricted life. Whether dominating on the gridiron as a college football star, fighting in Vietnam or captaining a shrimp boat, Forrest inspires people with his childlike optimism"
